entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Arviat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:36 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -35.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 1:00 PM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -35.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -40.1°C
Wind: NW 31 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 57 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Thursday 02 February 2023
